text: Whenever I run `hs auth`, the command works and updates my config file. Then when I run a hs command (ie `hs watch x y --portal=NEW_ACCOUNT`) the saved portal gets automatically deleted from the config file. This happen to anyone else?
Yep. I’ve struggled with this at random for the past few months. Seems to only happen for random portals. I haven’t been able to pinpoint it to a specific command. It’s quite frustrating.
I quit vs code after I did it and it seems to do the trick for now <@UB690RZA7>

That’s good to hear. Let me know if it ever happens again. I can’t be the only person to have this struggle. I’ve restarted all things, updated node, updated the CLI, uninstalled the CLI and set up a new local folder, no dice. Although since the last update of what was it, node? or the CLI? I haven’t had the issue. Fingers crossed something happened with that update.
Has been happening to me too
